sentences.en: A handful of people on a leaky boat are going to save the world?
sentences.cn: 这一小撮在这个破船上的人将会拯救世界?

sentences.en: Are you quick to repair leaky faucets and running toilets?
sentences.cn: 见到漏水的龙头和跑水的马桶你很快就修好了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Commend me to a leaky house on a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 雨天我要漏水的房子才怪呢.

sentences.en: Fluid pressure , flux, leaky and impermeable boundary conditions may be prescribed.
sentences.cn: 可指定流体压力 、 涌出量 、 泄漏量和非渗透边界条件.

sentences.en: He is an adventurer who traces leaky plumbing to its source.
sentences.cn: 他是个冒险家,他追踪水管漏水,一直追踪到它的根源.

sentences.en: I was at my wit's end trying to stop the leaky pipe.
sentences.cn: 我为了止住水管漏水而绞尽脑汁.

sentences.en: Indigestion may lead to leaky - gut syndrome or food allergies.
sentences.cn: 消化不良可能导致漏肠综合徵或食物过敏.

sentences.en: The house had a leaky roof.
The plumber went down to the cellar to fix the leaky pipe.
sentences.cn: 管道工到地下室去修漏水的管子.

sentences.en: The roof is leaky and the rain comes in.
To test for a leaky # 2 shutoff, use the following procedure.
sentences.cn: 要检测泄漏的2 号 关闭阀, 请采用下列程序.

sentences.en: To test for a leaky No.2 shutoff, use the following procedure.
sentences.cn: 为了检测2号关闭阀的泄漏率, 请采用下列程序.

sentences.en: Until you've dealt with a leaky roof, faulty wiring, and unwelcome guests.
sentences.cn: 你还需要对付漏水的屋顶 、 乱七八糟的布线, 还有不速之客.

sentences.en: Water is dripping from that leaky faucet.
sentences.cn: 水正从漏水的笼头滴下来.

sentences.en: Water oozed from the leaky pipe.
sentences.cn: 水从漏的管子中渗出来.

sentences.en: We heard the drip of a leaky faucet.
sentences.cn: 我听到了漏龙头的滴水声.

words.tran_cn: 水压试验时出汗；有漏元件；渗水铸件

trans.tran_cn: 有漏洞的，有漏隙的，渗漏的
trans.tran_en: a container, roof etc that is leaky has a hole or crack in it so that liquid or gas passes through it
